metadata.title: CVE-2024-36957 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:octeontx2-af: avoid off-by-one read from userspace We try to access count +1 byte from userspace with memdup_user(buffer, count + 1). However, theuserspace only provides buffer of count bytes and only these count bytesare verified to be okay to access. To ensure the copied buffer is NULterminated, we use memdup_user_nul instead.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
